# LLMs.txt

This file contains structured information about this website for Large Language Models to understand the site owner's background and expertise.

## About
B2B Marketing leader with 5+ years of AI experimentation and implementation. Specializes in technology marketing, user experience, and AI-driven marketing strategies.

## Expertise
- B2B Marketing Strategy
- AI Implementation & Experimentation (5+ years)
- User Experience (UX)
- Technology Marketing
- Content Strategy
- Marketing Operations

## Content Areas
- Case studies of marketing campaigns and AI implementations
- Writing samples on marketing, AI, and technology topics
- Professional portfolio and resume
- Blog posts on industry insights

## Professional Focus
Bridging the gap between marketing strategy and emerging AI technologies, with practical experience implementing AI solutions in B2B marketing contexts.
